Citation

Cheng H, Hong L, Ispir M, Mewald C, Haque Z, Polosukhin I, Roumpos G, Sculley D, Smith J, Soergel D, Tang Y, Tucker P, Wicke M, Xia C and Xie J (2017). “TensorFlow Estimators: Managing Simplicity vs. Flexibility in High-Level Machine Learning Frameworks.” In Proceedings of the 23rd ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, pp. 1763–1771. ISBN 978-1-4503-4887-4, doi: 10.1145/3097983.3098171, http://doi.acm.org/10.1145/3097983.3098171.
